title: 90/345/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 June 1990 amending the reinforced plan for the eradication of African swine fever presented by Portugal (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 June 1990
amending the reinforced plan for the eradication of African swine fever presented by Portugal
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(90/345/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendements to the reinforced plan for the eradication of African swine fever presented by Portugal is hereby approved.
The amendments of the reinforced plan referred to in Article 1 shall take effect on 1 January 1990.
This Decision is addressed to Portugal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 June 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
